mutants.code:
def is_perfect_square_ascii_sum(S: str) -> int:
    ascii_sum = sum((ord(char) for char in S))
    sqrt_sum = int(ascii_sum * 0.5)
    return 1 if sqrt_sum * sqrt_sum == ascii_sum else 0

    ascii_sum = sum((ord(char) for char in S))
    sqrt_sum = int(ascii_sum + 0.5)
    return 1 if sqrt_sum * sqrt_sum == ascii_sum else 0
